column2: "There's a really handy weapon out there that anyone with a thirst for the kill can use. It's called a Gunslash."
"Up close and personal, it can be used like a sword, and from far away, you can use it like a gun. Talk about having your cake and eating it, too!"
"Honestly, it's not as good as a regular gun for shooting, but there's still something to be said for its versatility."
"Here, I'll give you one to try out."
"The best way to get up to speed with it is to get some hands-on experience. Why not torment some enemies with it?"
